fields.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Tax Status Data element to specify 1 or more Tax Statuses for a company.

Workday uses the Tax Recovery Pro Rata Factor Percentage to reduce the tax recoverability amount on transactions for this company. The value ranges from 0 to 1 with 3 decimal places of precision. Set to 1 in order to use the full amount (100%) of the calculated tax recoverability. There is no tax recoverability on transactions for this company if you don't specify a value or set it to 0.
VAT on Payment, set to true for VAT on Payment option for Company, otherwise set to false.

The value ranges from 0 to 1 with 3 decimal places of precision. Set to 1 in order to use the full amount (100%) of the calculated tax recoverability. There is no tax recoverability on transactions for this company if you don't specify a value or set it to 0.
